title: Yakin Byoutou (Night Shift Nurses)
synopsis: On a forbidden hospital ward, the head doctor performs madly erotic experiments, stripping the nursing staff of their uniforms, inhibitions and self-control... until even he is shocked by what he uncovers!
related_anime: ['Yakin Byoutou Kranke', 'Nanase Ren', 'Yakin Byoutou Ni', 'Yakin Byoutou', 'Yakin Byoutou Specials']
characters: ['Nanase, Ren', 'Hirasaka, Ryuji', 'Shinjou, Remi', 'Kodama, Hikaru', 'Fujisawa, Ako', 'Ohkawa, Naoya', 'Kodama, Ai']
